[[Version 1.1]]
*The description of Archaic Petra was changed.
**{{Color|Old description:}} 4-Piece Set: Upon obtaining <span class="bg-highlight">a crystal</span> created through a <span class="bg-highlight">Geo Elemental</span> Reaction, all party members gain <span class="bg-highlight">35% RES</span> to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental RES can be gained in this manner at any one time.
**{{Color|New description:}} 4-Piece Set: Upon obtaining <span class="bg-highlight">an Elemental Shard</span> created through a <span class="bg-highlight">Crystallize</span> Reaction, all party members gain <span class="bg-highlight">35% DMG</span> to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG can be gained in this manner at any one time.
